thread.title: Monica

author: Monica
title: Monica
text:
The best price I could find anywhere in that style.
The price you see is the price you pay - no shipping, no taxes, no duty, no UPS fee. I was like WOW! Very important if you live in Canada and you know how bad we can get hit from every angle.
Super fast shipping. And I mean really fast, you'll get it in Canada (mine was shipped from US) in 2-3 days.
It's already installed . Solid, heavy piece. Easy installation.
We love it!
Thank you Hudson Reed
